memberdef.name: KOKKOS_EXPECTS
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ if (!bool(__VA_ARGS__)) { \ ::Kokkos::abort( \ "Kokkos contract violation:
 " \ " Expected precondition `" #__VA_ARGS__ \ "` evaluated false.
" \ "Error at " KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING(__FILE__) ":" KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING( \ __LINE__) " 
"); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: KOKKOS_ENSURES
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ if (!bool(__VA_ARGS__)) { \ ::Kokkos::abort( \ "Kokkos contract violation:
 " \ " Ensured postcondition `" #__VA_ARGS__ \ "` evaluated false.
" \ "Error at " KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING(__FILE__) ":" KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING( \ __LINE__) " 
"); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: KOKKOS_ASSERT
memberdef.initializer:
{ \ if (!bool(__VA_ARGS__)) { \ ::Kokkos::abort( \ "Kokkos contract violation:
 " \ " Asserted condition `" #__VA_ARGS__ \ "` evaluated false.
" \ "Error at " KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING(__FILE__) ":" KOKKOS_IMPL_TOSTRING( \ __LINE__) " 
"); \ } \ }
